I can recall few experiences with film as personal and moving as my most recent watch of About Time. More than a romantic comedy with a twist, this is an expertly written, shot, directed, and scored masterpiece which bridges the gap between romance, drama, comedy, and tragedy like few have. Ending with a cliche yet profound message that will stick with you for a long time after, this was one of my favorite watches ever.
